title: How to Make Smiley Faced Pita Bread Pizzas

steps.headline: Take one pita bread and spread the tomato puree evenly.
Sprinkle the cheese on top of the tomato puree
Slice one tomato in half and lay them in the position where eyes would be.
Slice the yellow pepper into rings.
steps.description: Slice the rings in half; place one piece of yellow pepper above the eyes to represent eyebrows.

steps.headline: Now place the mushroom in the middle of the pita bread to represent the nose.
Slice one ball of mozzarella in half.
steps.description: Put one 3 centimeter (1.2 in) to the left of the nose and one 3 centimeter (1.2 in) to the right, to represent cheeks.

steps.headline: Slice the red pepper into rings.
steps.description: Cut in half then place at the bottom to represent a mouth.

steps.headline: Slice the green pepper into rings.
steps.description: Cut them in half and place them on the left over pieces of yellow and green pepper, and place them at the top to represent hair.

steps.headline: Cook in the oven for 10 minutes at 190 degrees.

text: Take one pita bread and spread the tomato puree evenly.  Sprinkle the cheese on top of the tomato puree  Slice one tomato in half and lay them in the position where eyes would be.  Slice the yellow pepper into rings. Slice the rings in half; place one piece of yellow pepper above the eyes to represent eyebrows. Now place the mushroom in the middle of the pita bread to represent the nose.  Slice one ball of mozzarella in half. Put one 3 centimeter (1.2 in) to the left of the nose and one 3 centimeter (1.2 in) to the right, to represent cheeks. Slice the red pepper into rings. Cut in half then place at the bottom to represent a mouth. Slice the green pepper into rings. Cut them in half and place them on the left over pieces of yellow and green pepper, and place them at the top to represent hair. Cook in the oven for 10 minutes at 190 degrees.
